field.name: required
field.label: Required
field.description: Set to Yes to make this field mandatory

field.name: chain_select-enabled-option
field.label: CE_CF_RADIOBUTTON_CHAIN_SELECT_FIELD_TO_UPDATE_LABEL
field.query: SELECT id, name FROM #__ce_cf WHERE type = 'sql' AND published=1

field.query: SELECT alias, name FROM #__ce_cf WHERE type = 'sql' AND published=1

field.name: acylist
